homepage.hero.description.message: A modern workflow automation tool that lets you define complex task pipelines using simple YAML or JSON files. Supports conditional execution, parallel processing, interactive prompts, and beautiful terminal output.

homepage.codeExample.subtitle.message: Define workflows declaratively with YAML instead of complex scripts.

homepage.features.subtitle.message: Discover the powerful features that task-pipeliner offers

homepage.features.conditional.descriptio.message: Execute steps based on file existence, user selection, environment variables, and more

homepage.features.parallel.description.message: Run multiple tasks simultaneously to save time

homepage.features.parallel.detail3.message: Wait for all steps to complete

homepage.features.prompt.description.message: Request user input and selections during execution

homepage.features.output.description.message: Real-time terminal output with colors and formatting

homepage.features.variables.description.message: Use variables throughout workflows with {{variable}} syntax

homepage.features.scheduling.description.message: Automatically execute workflows using cron expressions

homepage.features.baseDir.description.message: Set a base directory for all command execution

homepage.features.baseDir.detail2.message: Interpreted relative to workflow file location

homepage.useCases.subtitle.message: Various scenarios you can solve with task-pipeliner

homepage.useCases.cicd.description.message: Automate build, test, and deployment workflows

homepage.useCases.monorepo.description.message: Manage multiple projects in a single repository

homepage.useCases.devEnv.description.message: Set up and manage development environments

homepage.useCases.interactive.descriptio.message: Create interactive scripts with user prompts and selections
